Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing wild-type and mutant SNCA variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased aggregation of p.E46K variant observed compared to wild-type.
Enhanced α-synuclein oligomerization detected in p.A53T variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA-expressing cells used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells used as negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Description: Immunofluorescence analysis performed on post-mortem brain tissues from Parkinson's patients.

Readout description.Result Description: p.E46K variant showed increased intracellular aggregation in dopaminergic neurons.
p.A53T variant exhibited enhanced Lewy body-like inclusions in brain tissue.

Biological replicates.Description: Five brain tissue samples analyzed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each slide was imaged in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA-expressing cell cultures used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-specific IgG used as negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Inclusion bodies ≤ 10% of total neuronal population.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Inclusion bodies > 40% of total neuronal population.
